headline.print_headline: Germany Investigates if Boy, 12, Planted a Bomb
headline.main: Germany Investigates if Boy, 12, Planted Bomb at Christmas Market

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

snippet: The case of the boy, who is of Iraqi origin, prompts new worry about the potential threats from young people radicalized by the Islamic State....
lead_paragraph: The case of the boy, who is of Iraqi origin, prompts new worry about the potential threats from young people radicalized by the Islamic State.
